FAQ.title: Here your questions are answered
FAQ.description: Other people who use lookouts wonder

1.question: What is lookouts?
1.answer: Mirantes is a SaaS platform where people can manage their careers (this includes finding jobs and monitoring the state of their candidates) and companies can manage their employees (this includes launching vacancies, recruiting and hiring)

2.question: What is available at lookouts?
2.answer: Mirantes is a SaaS platform where people can manage their careers (this includes finding jobs and monitoring the state of their candidates) and companies can manage their employees (this includes launching vacancies, recruiting and hiring)
